data.title: Clearlight Infrared Sauna Introduces New Line Of Sanctuary Cedar Wood Saunas
data.meta_description: Clearlight Infrared Saunas introduces a new line of Sanctuary Cedar Wood Saunas that offer unmatched therapeutic benefits, LCD "Swivel" Touch Screen with DVD Player and state-of-the-art infrared heating technology.
data.text:
Clearlight Infrared Saunas, makers of True Wave IIâ„¢ innovative heaters, has recently introduced a line of new Sanctuary Cedar Wood Saunas to their growing product line. The new Sanctuary infrared saunas are made with the highest quality tongue and groove grade "A" clear Western Red Canadian Cedar and come equipped with Clearlight's signature advanced True Wave II heating technology.

With increased control panel options, the new infrared saunas provide many additional features including: recessed ceiling mood and reading lights, LCD "Swivel" Touch Screen that controls temperature, time and lights, windows for light and ventilation and a high quality AM/FM/CD/DVD stereo with two-way built-in speaker system. Available in 3 different seating models, the patent pending Sanctuary Infrared Saunas also come with a lifetime warranty as well as easy installation instructions. With a full-glass front providing a more open, contemporary look, these infrared saunas can also easily plug into any standard 120 volt wall outlet, providing simple power options to any type of home, apartment or business. All of Clearlight's infrared saunas (depending on which model) require a 15 amp or 20 amp circuit. The average 30 minute sauna session cost less than 12 cents.

"We are very pleased to introduce our Sanctuary infrared saunas that include many new exciting features to our growing client list," stated Andy Kaps, President of Sauna Works. "The combination of our luxurious contemporary design and our True Wave II technology provides exceptional quality infrared healing benefits for people right in their own home."

Sauna Works is one of the only manufacturers of infrared saunas with certifications from the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC), the Sustainable Forestry Initiative (SFI), and the Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification (PEFC) making them one of the most environmentally responsible infrared sauna organizations in the United States.

To find out additional information about Clearlight Infrared Sauna's product offerings, please visit http://www.infraredsauna.com/. Find them on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/saunaworks or on Twitter at https://twitter.com/SaunaWorks.
